main event: A witness reported seeing a bright greenish-white object with flashing lights, shaped like an inverted cone, moving slowly to the northeast over a duration of 32 minutes.
interesting points: The object was about the size of a basketball., The sighting occurred at 08:02 local time., The object faded slowly as it moved., The observation was made on a clear night., The witness was a salesman with 4 years of experience in radar and electronics.
sighted object: bright greenish-white inverted cone with flashing lights
witness description: salesman with 4 years radar and electronics experience in the Navy
